tasks.question: I was trying to sneak a cookie when my mom walked in.
She was drawing a picture of her teacher with funny hair.
They were playing hide-and-seek in the library (very quietly!).
He was pretending to be a superhero during math class.
We were building a huge tower of books when it crashed down.
My friend was telling a really long story about his pet hamster.
The teacher was explaining something important, but I was daydreaming about pizza.
I was practicing my dance moves in the kitchen when my dad started cooking.
She was writing a secret message to her best friend in class.
They were arguing about who was the best video game player.
He was trying to juggle apples and dropped them all over the floor.
We were making a silly movie with our phones.
My sister was singing very loudly in the bathroom.
The dog was chasing its tail in circles.
I was reading a comic book under my desk when the teacher asked a question.
